TEXT.S: = Lasutan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Hwareynsu ka alang Lasutan. 1,940 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 4,942 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 13% niqan 633 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 87% niqan 4,309 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 9%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%.
